page.title: 08Great Orton School (cont)
page.content: "There is a broad curriculum so that basic skills learned can be used in a variety of lessons formally or through activity methods.Each child is encour- aged to apply his skill & expertise to the subject being studied".(Quote from school prospectus). We have 2 houses, Solway and Skiddaw & we get points for our work which we record on a chart.Each year these are added up & a cup given to the house with the most points. Outside the school is a field area & playground.Sports include foot- ball,cricket,rounders,hockey, netball, tennis & various team games.Each year we join with 7 small schools for football, cross-country, netball & sports.Cups are awarded to the winning schools in each event. Since 1980 the "Parents & Friends of the School" have organised many events. The recorder group play at assembly & concerts.
